```{r setup}
library(MO)
crc1tree=read.tree("crc1.tre")

cells=crc1tree$tip.label
genotype_178_cells_gt=read.csv("CRC1_mutation_data.csv")

genotype_178_initial_obs=genotype_178_cells_gt[c(cells)]

alpha = 1.52/100
beta = 7.89/100

lambda01=1
lambda02=0
lambda12=0
  
test=MO(alpha,beta,lambda01,lambda02,lambda12,initial_obs = genotype_178_cells_gt,t=crc1tree,binary=TRUE,multinomialPrior=FALSE)
```
